choices: Erivc (Aka person outside of the universe from ours. Gets sort of weird.)
15.title: other

choices: Take it home and put it up
Crap your gonna be late as is just hurry to class
154.content: As you are heading to school, you pass by a strange new shop, finding it interesting you decide to go in for some reason you feel drawn to look around. “Well, hello there.” A teenage boy slightly older than you said appearing out of seemingly nowhere. “ What can I do for you?” “I just felt like looking around .” You answer the somewhat strange boy trying to be some what nice. His parents must own this shop kind of cool I guess getting to hang out here. “Shouldn't you be heading to school though?” The boy said “I could ask you the same question I mean even if you worked here you don‘t look much older then me.” You reply, the boy simply smiled and shrugged. “I’ve already graduated.” He replied walking slowly past you knocking a doll off a self at your feet. “Oh.” You say, when you see the doll, it was Soi Fong from bleach. You can’t explain why, but you feel attracted to it, not in any physical way though. It was just a small plush doll she was cute but Soi Fong wasn't exactly your favorite but still you decide to buy it. “How much is this?” You ask taking the doll to the counter, Seeing it the boy raises an eye. “Are you sure you want it?” The boy asked, though you didn't notice despite his voice carrying a cautious curiosity he was smiling. “Yeah, I can’t explain why, but I want it real bad.” You reply, when he tells you how much it costs, you buy it right away. “By the way, what’s your name?” “My name is john now then you should be getting off to school. Stay safe, and be careful Eric.” The boy replies just as you walk out of the shop. “Wait I don’t remember telling him my name….” You exclaim slowly as youu turn around to ask him how he knew. As you turn to the spot where the shop had been your eyes open wide seeing just an empty lot. What the? Did I just imagine the whole thing? You wonder, but then you notice that you are still holding the bag in your hand, reaching in you take the doll. “I should go back home and put this away this is just a little too weird.” You say, figuring that you still had time before school. Besides you've watched way to many movies to bring something so mysterious to school.
154.title: Erivc (Aka person outside of the universe from ...

1541.content:
When you get home you toss the doll onto your bed, but suddenly it glows and a strange smoke emerges. The smoke rises from the dool condensing around itself taking on
